column2: Kata Robata is just okay and therefore
column3: way overpriced. I don't mind spending the cash when it is worth it (Uchi
column4: that's to you) but this place just falls short in too many ways. I can't believe anyone gave this restaurant more than 3 stars. I would have if not for the cost. We ended up spending $115 including tip for just the two of us and that was for a little bit of food and 3 drinks
column5: most of which were on happy hour so imagine what they would have normally cost.
